author: Staff Reporter
text:
Thoothukudi district electoral officials have intensified enforcement of model code of conduct ahead of the forthcoming assembly polls. Under Thoothukudi assembly constituency, 31 complaints of violations in the model code of conduct had been received, Sub Collector and Returning Officer to this constituency S. Gopala Sundara Raj said here on Monday.

The violations were mostly concerned with graffiti, wall posters and flag-posts kept at public places.

Action was taken against violations and 339 wall posters and other hoardings of political parties had been removed.

Moreover, he said a ‘WhatsApp’ number 8903129134 has been introduced to lodge complaints of any irregularities or violations in the model code of conduct.

The facility would be available round-the-clock. Besides, complaints of irregularities could also be lodged through www.elections.tn.gov.in
title: Enforcement of code intensified
